content.rendered:
Emily Baughman

Operations Manager

Emily Baughman is an accomplished government contracting professional with over a decade of experience in contracts, technology and program management. She has a proven ability to lead complex programs and manage profitable, high-visibility contracts, consistently delivering exceptional results. Emily’s expertise in optimizing contract performance and her insight into technology solutions have consistently delivered exceptional value and utility to both her customer and her employer. Her breadth of industry knowledge, passion and dedication to her work position her as an invaluable lynchpin in the government contracting sector.
Contact Me
